QuestData.Title: Wings of Liberty
QuestData.Description:
When the Felskorn assaulted the nest, the Thorignir fought bravely to save our brood. But their demonic allies proved too much, and many of us were captured.
Even now they work to corrupt my brothers and sisters to turn them to their side.
Please, outsider, free them from this fate!
QuestData.LogDescription: Free Aleifir, Hrafsir, Erilar and Hridmogir in Thorim's Peak.
QuestData.RewardText: I am truly indebted to you for this act. My siblings were not able to defend themselves against the Felskorn, and would have ended up their slaves. $B$BYou are a true friend of the Thorignir.
